metadata.description: AWS function to compliance ID mapping with matched rule_ids

acm_certificates_expiration_check.mapping_notes: Checks certificate expiration - monitoring implies checking

apigateway_restapi_logging_enabled.mapping_notes: Rest API logging enabled - audit logging is same as logging

apigateway_restapi_waf_acl_attached.mapping_notes: WAF ACL attached means WAF is enabled

apigatewayv2_api_access_logging_enabled.mapping_notes: Access logging enabled - audit logging is access logging

athena_workgroup_encryption.mapping_notes: Encryption enabled means encryption at rest

aws_No checks defined.mapping_notes: S3 bucket public access block enabled - fixed from invalid CSV entry

aws_accessanalyzer_enabled.mapping_notes: Checks if Access Analyzer is enabled - same security control

aws_account_maintain_current_contact_det.mapping_notes: Validates current contact details are maintained

aws_account_security_contact_info_comple.mapping_notes: Checks completeness of security contact information

aws_autoscaling_group_multiple_az.mapping_notes: Multi-AZ deployment is same as multiple AZ configuration

aws_backup_plans_exist.mapping_notes: Checks if backup plans exist - similar to plan configured

aws_backup_recovery_point_encrypted.mapping_notes: Recovery point encrypted = Backup point encrypted (same AWS Backup concept)

aws_backup_replication_check.mapping_notes: Backup replication check - likely checking cross-region replication config in plan

semantic_issues: Resource mismatch: 'plan' in function vs 'plans' in rule
Singular 'plan' vs plural 'plans' - likely different scopes

aws_cloudfront_distributions_origin_traf.mapping_notes: Origin traffic encryption = encryption in transit to origin

aws_cloudtrail_kms_encryption_enabled.mapping_notes: CloudTrail encryption at rest = KMS encryption (same control)

aws_cloudtrail_log_file_validation_enabl.mapping_notes: File validation = log file validation (same feature)

aws_cloudtrail_s3_dataevents_read_enable.mapping_notes: S3 data events read logging (same control)

aws_cloudtrail_s3_dataevents_write_enabl.mapping_notes: S3 data events write logging (same control)

aws_cloudtrail_threat_detection_enumerat.mapping_notes: Found in suggested_rule_ids - CloudTrail threat detection for enumeration attacks

aws_cloudtrail_threat_detection_llm_jack.mapping_notes: Found in suggested_rule_ids - CloudTrail threat detection for LLM jacking

aws_cloudtrail_threat_detection_privileg.mapping_notes: Found in suggested_rule_ids - CloudTrail threat detection for privilege escalation

aws_cloudwatch_log_analysis_enabled.mapping_notes: Suggested rule match - same service and resource

aws_cloudwatch_log_group_retention_polic.mapping_notes: CloudWatch log group retention policy (minimum days)

aws_cloudwatch_log_metric_filter_authent.mapping_notes: Suggested rule match - same service and resource

aws_ec2_ebs_public_snapshot.mapping_notes: EBS snapshot should not be public

aws_ec2_elastic_ip_shodan.mapping_notes: Now matches after fixing elasticipshodan  eip

aws_ec2_elastic_ip_unassigned.mapping_notes: Elastic IP should be in use (not unassigned/unused)

aws_ec2_networkacl_allow_ingress_tcp_por.mapping_notes: Network ACL should restrict RDP port 3389

aws_ec2_patch_compliance.mapping_notes: EC2 instances should be patch compliant (Systems Manager)

aws_ec2_transitgateway_auto_accept_vpc_a.mapping_notes: Transit Gateway should not auto-accept VPC attachments (security boundary control)

aws_kinesis_stream_data_retention_period.mapping_notes: Kinesis stream data retention period check

aws_kms_cmk_are_used.mapping_notes: Customer managed keys should be used (not AWS managed)

aws_kms_cmk_not_deleted_unintentionally.mapping_notes: KMS CMK should not be scheduled for deletion (preventing unintentional deletion)

aws_kms_cmk_not_multi_region.mapping_notes: KMS key should not be multi-region (single-region keys for compliance/data residency)

aws_kms_key_expiration_set.mapping_notes: Suggested rule match - same service and resource

aws_networkfirewall_in_all_vpc.mapping_notes: Network firewall organizational policy - security controls covered by VPC flow logs, security groups, network ACLs, GuardDuty, and Config (15 related checks mapped)

aws_networkfirewall_logging_enabled.mapping_notes: Network Firewall logging should be enabled

aws_networkfirewall_multi_az.mapping_notes: Network Firewall should be deployed across multiple availability zones

aws_opensearch_service_domains_internal_.mapping_notes: OpenSearch internal user database (for fine-grained access control)

aws_s3_bucket_public_access.mapping_notes: S3 bucket public access block configured

aws_s3_website_https_only.mapping_notes: S3 website should use HTTPS only (secure transport policy)

aws_sagemaker_endpoint_config_prod_varia.mapping_notes: SageMaker endpoint production variant instance configuration

aws_vpc_different_regions.mapping_notes: VPC multi-region deployment maps to automated isolation (HA/DR pattern)

aws_vpc_endpoint_connections_trust_bound.mapping_notes: VPC endpoint connection trust boundaries = policy least privilege principle

aws_vpc_endpoint_multi_az_enabled.mapping_notes: VPC endpoint should span multiple availability zones for HA

aws_vpc_endpoint_services_allowed_princi.mapping_notes: VPC endpoint service allowed principals trust boundaries = policy least privilege

aws_vpc_subnet_different_az.mapping_notes: Suggested rule match - same service and resource
